Access.manageInvitations: Manage your invitations to other users
Access.removeError: An error occurred while removing the invitation.
Access.removedInvMessage: The invitation for ${selectedInvitation.email} has been removed.
Access.removeInvAsk: Are you sure you want to remove the invitation for{
Access.removeInvWarn: Once removed, this invitation will no longer be valid. You can always re-invite the user later.
Access.confirm: To confirm, please type the email address of the invitation below.
Access.OrgIdMessage: Unable to regenerate invitation without an organization ID.
Access.sentInv: A new invitation has been sent to ${invitation.email}.
Access.generateInv: A new invitation has been generated for ${invitation.email}.
Access.duplicateInvMessage: An invitation for this user already exists.
Access.rateLimitMessage: You have exceeded the limit of 3 regenerations per hour. Please try again later.
Access.regenerateInvMessage: An error occurred while regenerating the invitation.
Access.revokeInv: Revoke previous invitation and create a new one
Access.revokeInvMessage: Are you sure you want to regenerate the invitation for {invitation?.email}? This will revoke the previous invitation.
Access.sendMail: Send email notification to the user
Access.regeneratedInvMessage: The invitation has been regenerated. The user must access the link below to accept the invitation.
